entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries changing to periods of light snow this evening and ending overnight then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 3 April 2023
